content: Xiaobai Sun | Scholars@Duke profile Skip to main content Xiaobai Sun Professor of Computer Science Computer Science xiaobai.sun@duke.edu Box 90129, Durham, NC 27708-0129 D107 Lev Sci Res Ctr, Durham, NC 27708 At a Glance Overview Numerical analysis, matrix theory, high-performance scientific computing, and parallel computing. Current Projects: Theory and algorithm development for large matrix computation problems arising in computational science and engineering.
